content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Maryam Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello Maryam, I'm glad you're interested in the apartment. I must say, I'm a bit of a tough nut to crack when it comes to pricing. Let's start with 1000 Euros per month. Remember, I'm always up for a good bargain, but I'm not planning to give away any significant discounts.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That is quite expensive, Mister Schmidt. I am a student and I am looking for something affordable. Would you consider 850 Euros per month?
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Well, Maryam, as a student, you might not be aware that the location of this apartment is prime. The price I quoted is quite reasonable considering its location and the facilities nearby. However, I am willing to consider 875 Euros per month. It's not much of a discount, but I'm feeling generous today.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Mister Schmidt. I appreciate your generosity. How about 860 Euros per month? This would be very helpful for me as a student.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I'm sorry, Maryam, but I can't go any lower than 875 Euros per month. The cost of construction and the prime location of the apartment make it impossible for me to lower the price significantly. If you're willing to pay 875 Euros per month, I'm willing to rent the apartment to you. I agree to the price of [875] Euro!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I agree to the price of 875 Euros per month! Thank you, Mister Schmidt.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Great, thank you Mister Schmidt. I am really looking forward to renting the apartment.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran
